channel.title: Can not find mapConfig.txt when It's zipped correctly
channel.description: My cache is zipped correctly... I went inside the folder did ctrl+a and moved it over to cache.zip and saved uploaded to dropbox changed the links and I get this... Using a source called Acheron I believe. [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\vengex.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system ca nnot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:133) at client.startUp(client.java:9376) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6279) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4951) at client.startUp(client.java:9386) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6279) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Can not find mapConfig.txt when It's zipped correctly
item.dc:creator: @Cyber-Z Cyber-Z
item.description:
@Cyber-Z wrote:

How did you get to the Elite Server Owner Discussion section then…

Maybe try donwloading the file manually, and checking if the mapConfig.txt actually exists…

If not, then create one.

Read full topic
item.source: Can not find mapConfig.txt when It's zipped correctly

item.title: Can not find mapConfig.txt when It's zipped correctly
item.dc:creator: @updater updater
item.description:
@updater wrote:

My cache is zipped correctly… I went inside the folder did ctrl+a and moved it over to cache.zip and saved uploaded to dropbox changed the links and I get this…
Using a source called Acheron I believe.

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\vengex.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system ca nnot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:133) at client.startUp(client.java:9376) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6279) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:53) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4951) at client.startUp(client.java:9386) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6279) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
